name: Nirvana Piñata
description:
Description

You are a Piñata, tired of his stressful job, who is looking for mental peace through Yoga spiritual evolution. With the help of Yodragon Guru you will try to reach Nirvana with the posing techniques of Hatha Yoga. Practice makes perfect, imitation is the way to achieve that…
Replicate the Guru's poses, don’t lose your mind or break your legs… Yoga can be a dangerous business.

How to

Drag character's limbs, maintain position and pass each levels through increasingly difficult Asanas (the names of Yoga Pose).

Awards

Made for #KingGameJam 2018 in Barcelona, winner of Art Award.
